attributes.action: Withhold permission for Scotland to hold a second independence referendum
attributes.additional_details:
All economic data points to the failure of a Scottish state and the Scottish National Party has a one focus agenda which diminishes the contributions the Scottish people have made to the success of the Union for the last 400 + years.
The UK has enough to achieve in managing Brexit and is a negotiation for the whole of the UK.   However,  were another referendum be approved for Scottish independence, the possibility of breaking-up the UK Union should be put to all the people of Great Britain, not just the Scots,  for the result affects all of us and not just them.
attributes.background: Consent for any repeat referendum must be given by the UK parliament and this should be denied empathically.
